required_header.download_date: ClinicalTrials.gov processed this data on July 28, 2020
required_header.link_text: Link to the current ClinicalTrials.gov record.

clinical_study.brief_title: A Multi-Center Study of Ibrutinib in Combination With MEDI4736 in Subjects With Relapsed or Refractory Lymphomas
clinical_study.official_title: A Multi-Center Open-Label Study of the Bruton's Tyrosine Kinase (BTK) Inhibitor, Ibrutinib, in Combination With MEDI4736, in Subjects With Relapsed or Refractory Lymphomas

brief_summary.textblock: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the efficacy, safety and tolerability of the combination treatment of ibrutinib and MEDI4736 in subjects with relapsed or refractory lymphomas.

primary_outcome.measure: Phase 1b/2 : Overall Response Rate of Number of Participants
primary_outcome.time_frame: From the date of first study treatment until progressive disease
primary_outcome.description: The response criteria is measured based on the revised criteria for malignant lymphoma described by the International Working Group for NHL (Cheson 2014).

secondary_outcome.time_frame: Time from the date of initial response to the date of disease progression or the date of death due to any cause, whichever occurs first.
first dose date of study drug (ibrutinib or MEDI4736) to the first documentation of disease progression
First dose date of study drug (ibrutinib or MEDI4736) to the date of death due to any cause

secondary_outcome.measure: Phamacokinetics: Mean Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Cmax) for Ibrutinib
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Lead-In Day 6/7 or Cycle 3 Day 1 (collected at predose, 1, 2, 4, and 6 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Maximum observed plasma concentration of ibrutinib during the dosing interval on Lead-In Day 6/7 (ibrutinib only) or Cycle 3 Day 1 (ibrutinib + MEDI)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Mean Time to Maximum Observed Plasma Concentration (Tmax) for Ibrutinib
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Lead-In Day 6/7 or Cycle 3 Day 1 (collected at predose, 1, 2, 4, and 6 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Time to corresponding maximum observed plasma concentration of ibrutinib during the dosing interval on Lead-In Day 6/7 (ibrutinib only) or Cycle 3 Day 1 (ibrutinib + MEDI)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Mean Area Under the Plasma Concentration-Time Curve From Time 0-24 Hours (AUC0-24h) for Ibrutinib
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Lead-In Day 6/7 or Cycle 3 Day 1 (collected at predose, 1, 2, 4, and 6 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Ibrutinib AUC0-24h calculated using linear trapezoidal summation after dosing from time 0 to 24 hours on Lead-In Day 6/7 (ibrutinib only) or Cycle 3 Day 1 (ibrutinib + MEDI)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Mean Terminal Elimination Half-Life (t1/2,Term) for Ibrutinib
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Lead-In Day 6/7 or Cycle 3 Day 1 (collected at predose, 1, 2, 4, and 6 hours post-dose)
secondary_outcome.description: Ibrutinib terminal elimination half-life associated with the terminal slope (λz) of the semi-logarithmic plasma concentration-time curve, calculated as 0.693/λz on Lead-In Day 6/7 (ibrutinib only) or Cycle 3 Day 1 (ibrutinib + MEDI)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: Mean Peak Plasma Concentration (Cmax) for MEDI4736
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 6 Day 1 (collected 10 minutes after end of infusion)
secondary_outcome.description: Peak plasma concentration of MEDI4736 on Cycle 6 Day 1 (ibrutinib + MEDI)

secondary_outcome.description: Trough plasma concentration of MEDI4736 on Cycle 6 Day 1 (ibrutinib + MEDI)

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: MEDI4736 Accumulation Ratio for Cmax
secondary_outcome.time_frame: Cycle 6 Day 1 (collected 10 minutes after end of infusion)
secondary_outcome.description: Accumulation ratio from Cycle 6 Day 1 to Cycle 1 Day 1 for Cmax for MEDI4736

secondary_outcome.measure: Pharmacokinetics: MEDI4736 Accumulation Ratio for Ctrough
secondary_outcome.description: Accumulation ratio from Cycle 6 Day 1 to Cycle 1 Day 1 for Ctrough for MEDI4736

Pharmacodynamics of MEDI4736 in Subjects With Relapsed or Refractory Lymphomas

arm_group.description: In the Phase 1b (safety portion) of the study, a starting dose of 560 mg of ibrutinib and 10 mg/kg of MEDI4736 explored in cohort 1 and followed a 6+3 dose de-escalation design. Phase 2 used the phase 1b starting dose.

arm_group.arm_group_label: Phase 1b/ 2: Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma expansion cohort
arm_group.description: In the Phase 1b (safety portion) of the study, a starting dose of 560 mg of ibrutinib and 10 mg/kg of MEDI4736 explored in cohort 1 and followed a 6+3 dose de-escalation design. Phase 2 used the phase 1b starting dose.

intervention.arm_group_label: Phase 1b/ 2: Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma expansion cohort
Phase 1b/ 2: Diffuse large B-cell lymphoma expansion cohort

criteria.textblock:
Inclusion Criteria:
- Pathologically documented relapsed or refractory diffuse large B-cell lymphoma (DLBCL) or follicular lymphoma (FL)
- Measurable disease sites on CT scan (>1.5 cm in longest dimension)
- Adequate hematologic function:
1. Absolute Neutrophil Count >1500 cells/mm3
2. Platelets >50000 cells/mm3
3. Hemoglobin >8.0 g/dL
- Adequate hepatic and renal function:
1. AST or ALT ≤2.5 x ULN
2. Bilirubin ≤1.5 x ULN
3. Estimated creatinine clearance (Cockcroft-Gault) >40 mL/min
- ECOG 0 or 1
Exclusion Criteria:
- Received prior therapies: ibrutinib, or other BTK inhibitor and/or anti-PD1, anti-PD-L1, anti-PD-L2, anti-CD137, or CTLA-4 antibody
- Requires treatment or prophylaxis with a strong cytochrome P450 (CYP) 3A inhibitor
- Primary CNS lymphoma or evidence of CNS involvement by lymphoma

participant_flow.pre_assignment_details: While the study include Phase 1b and 2, the dosing was not changed between phases (following the study design because there were no DLTs and thus no dose adjustments in from Phase 1b to Phase 2). Thus the study data were reported with Phases 1b and 2 combined.

group.title: Phase 1b/ 2: Follicular Lymphoma Expansion Cohort
group.description: In the Phase 1b (safety portion) of the study, a starting dose of 560 mg of ibrutinib and 10 mg/kg of MEDI4736 explored in cohort 1 and followed a 6+3 dose de-escalation design. Phase 2 used the phase 1b starting dose.

measurement_list.measurement: The 95% Confidence Interval is not applicable because the median Duration of Response was estimated based on time to event data. The 95% Confidence limit cannot be estimated.
The median Duration of Response was not reached. The 95% Confidence limit cannot be estimated.

reported_events.time_frame: All AEs, whether serious or non-serious, are documented in the source documents from the time the signed and dated ICF is obtained until 30 days following the last dose of ibrutinib and 90 days following the last dose of MEDI4736.

certain_agreements.pi_employee: Principal Investigators are NOT employed by the organization sponsoring the study.
certain_agreements.restrictive_agreement: There is NOT an agreement between Principal Investigators and the Sponsor (or its agents) that restricts the PI's rights to discuss or publish trial results after the trial is completed.
